actions.text3: 🍟 *Now only administrators can edit group information*
actions.text4: 🍟 *All users can now edit group information*
actions.text6:
🍟 *¡Group title has been changed!*
New name:
actions.text7: Has been promoted to *administrator* role in this group.
actions.text8: Has been removed from their *administrator* role in this group.

setup.text2: This function is reserved exclusively for group administrators.
setup.text3: To execute this function, the bot must have administrator privileges.
setup.text4: This function is restricted to the bot developer.
setup.text5: This function can only be used within group chats.
setup.text6: This function is only available for individual chats.
setup.text7: This function is designated solely for the use of the bot number.
setup.text9: Your request is being processed, please wait a moment.
setup.text10: This function is available only to users with premium membership.

anti_link.text1:
🚩 *Link Alert*

This is the group link.
anti_link.text2:
🚩 *Link Alert*

You are an administrator, you may proceed as you wish.
anti_link.text3:
🚩 *Link Alert*

You are the owner, I cannot take actions against you.
anti_link.text5: Please refrain from sending links to other groups
anti_link.text6:
🚩 *Link Alert*

The bot does not have administrative privileges, it cannot remove links

anti_fake.text1:
🚩 *Suspicious number detected, you will be removed*

See you soon

allmenu.text2: _This is a bot in development, it does not have most of its commands._

report.text3: 🚩 *At least 10 characters are required to make the report*
report.text4: 🚩 *The report can contain a maximum of 1000 characters*

curiosity.text1: 🍿 Hi, I'm CuriosityBot. Check out this list of commands

antilink.text1:
🍟 Pressure *Activate* or *Deactivate*

`You can use`
.antilink on
.antilink off

antifake.text1:
🍟 Pressure *Activate* or *Deactivate*

`You can use`
.antifake on
.antifake off

play.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the title of a video*
_.play photograph_

play2.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the title of a video*
_.play2 photograph_

play3.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the title of a video*
_.play3 photograph_

gitclone.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the link of a Github repository*
_.gitclone https://github.com/AzamiJs/CuriosityBot_

tiktok.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the link of a TikTok video*
_.tiktok https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMMvybdev/_

facebook.text1:
🍟 *Please enter the link of a Facebook video*
_.fb https://www.facebook.com/watch?v=636541475139_

admins.text1: 🍟 *Please indicate your reason for contacting the administrators.*
admins.text2: 🚩 *The reason provided is too short, at least 10 characters are required.*

settings.text1:
🍟 *Select an option to configure the group.*

Example:
○ !grupo abrir
○ !grupo cerrar
○ !grupo bloquear
○ !grupo desbloquear

demote.text1:
🍟 *Tag the administrator you want to demote.*

Example: !demote @user
!demote *reply to a message*

fantasmas.text1: 🍟 *This group is active and contains no inactive members.*
fantasmas.text2:
🚩 *Inactive member review in progress.*

List of inactive members:

hidetag.text1: 🍟 *Enter or reply to a text to continue.*

kick.text1: 🍟 *Tag or reply to the message of the person you want to remove from the group.*

promote.text1:
🍟 *Tag the user you want to promote.*

Example: !promote @usuario
!promote *reply to a message*

update.text3:
🚩 *Local changes in bot files have been detected that conflict with updates from the repository. To update, reinstall the bot or perform the updates manually*

Conflicting files:
update.text4: 🚩 *An error has occurred. Please try again later*

reg.text13: > Select your language with the command .language

sticker.text1: 🍟 *Respond to an image or video using the command*
sticker.text2: 🚩 *The video can last a maximum of 15 seconds*
